thread.title: Twitter Thinks American Girl’s New Boy Doll Looks Like A Hipster Who Will Ghost You
thread.title_full: Twitter Thinks American Girl’s New Boy Doll Looks Like A Hipster Who Will Ghost You

author: Elyse Wanshel
title: Twitter Thinks American Girl’s New Boy Doll Looks Like A Hipster Who Will Ghost You
text:
Twitter Thinks American Girl’s New Boy Doll Looks Like A Hipster Who Will Ghost You ’Sup, ladies. Elyse Wanshel Trends Reporter, The Huffington Post 
The praise was nice while it lasted, Logan. 
On Tuesday, the internet was amped when it was reported that the popular doll company, American Girl, was debuting it’s very first boy doll named Logan Everett, a drummer from Nashville, Tennessee. 
“Adding a boy to our lineup has been a number one request for a very, very, very long time,” Julie Parks, director of public relations at American Girl, told The Huffington Post . 
Parks also noted that the creation of Logan was a response to requests from parents and kids asking for characters with “more experiences, more diversity, more interests.” 
Yet, some on Twitter aren’t really buying that. 
Many think American Girl’s first boy doll looks a lot like a person that’s pretty prevalent in American culture, bro, and that’s a typical, white, suburban dude. 
Here are just a few thoughts about Logan’s appearance from the folks of Twitter: why does this doll look like he's about to ghost you https://t.co/lC57Y3arw5 pic.twitter.com/oxBhoIgdFu — Heather Schmelzlen (@anchorlines) February 14, 2017 logan has absolutely texted 'haha and then what ;)" https://t.co/aPufyusOCO pic.twitter.com/DAPfZRk75u — Alanna Okun (@alanna) February 14, 2017 that name. I bet he's from brooklyn and his parents are actually a group of 5 writers who dabble in rooftop aquaponics and apiarism https://t.co/hkvmCShOoC
